def move_reindeer(r_y, r_x, r_d, score, moves_list, moves_count):

    #print (f"Reindeer at ({r_y},{r_x}) looking {r_d}, current score {score} after {moves_count} moves")

    if moves_count < 40:
        if r_d == '^':
            score_up = score
            score_right = score + 1000
            score_down = score + 2000
            score_left = score + 1000
        elif r_d == '>':
            score_up = score + 1000
            score_right = score
            score_down = score + 1000
            score_left = score + 2000
        elif r_d == 'v':
            score_up = score + 2000
            score_right = score + 1000
            score_down = score
            score_left = score + 1000
        elif r_d == '<':
            score_up = score + 1000
            score_right = score + 2000
            score_down = score + 1000
            score_left = score

        if not [r_y-1, r_x] in moves_list:
            look_up = df_locations.loc[(r_y-1, r_x)][0]
            #print(f"   looking up {look_up}")
            if look_up== '.':
                score_up += 1
                moves_up = moves_list + [[r_y-1, r_x]]
                moves_count += 1
                score_up, moves_up, moves_cnt_up = move_reindeer(r_y-1, r_x, '^', score_up, moves_up, moves_count)
            elif look_up== 'E':
                print (f"Reindeer at ({r_y},{r_x}) score {score} after {moves_count} moves")
                score_up += 1
                moves_up = moves_list
                moves_cnt_up = moves_count
            else:
                score_up = 999999999
                moves_up = moves_list
                moves_cnt_up = moves_count
        else:
            score_up = 999999999
            moves_up = moves_list
            moves_cnt_up = moves_count

        best_score = score_up
        best_moves = moves_up
        best_moves_count = moves_cnt_up

        if not [r_y, r_x+1] in moves_list:
            look_right = df_locations.loc[(r_y, r_x+1)][0]
            #print(f"   looking right {look_right}")
            if look_right == '.':
                score_right += 1
                moves_right = moves_list + [[r_y, r_x+1]]
                moves_count += 1
                score_right, moves_right, moves_cnt_right = move_reindeer(r_y, r_x+1, '>', score_right, moves_right, moves_count)
            elif look_right== 'E':
                print (f"Reindeer at ({r_y},{r_x}) score {score} after {moves_count} moves")
                score_right += 1
                moves_right = moves_list
                moves_cnt_right = moves_count
            else:
                score_right = 999999999
                moves_right = moves_list
                moves_cnt_right = moves_count
        else:
            score_right = 999999999
            moves_right = moves_list
            moves_cnt_right = moves_count

        if score_right < best_score:
            best_score = score_right
            best_moves = moves_right
            best_moves_count = moves_cnt_right

        if not [r_y+1, r_x] in moves_list:
            look_down = df_locations.loc[(r_y+1, r_x)][0]
            #print(f"   looking down {look_down}")
            if look_down == '.':
                score_down += 1
                moves_down = moves_list + [[r_y+1, r_x]]
                moves_count += 1
                score_down, moves_down, moves_cnt_down = move_reindeer(r_y+1, r_x, 'v', score_down, moves_down, moves_count)
            elif look_down== 'E':
                print (f"Reindeer at ({r_y},{r_x}) score {score} after {moves_count} moves")
                score_down += 1
                moves_down = moves_list
                moves_cnt_down = moves_count
            else:
                score_down = 999999999
                moves_down = moves_list
                moves_cnt_down = moves_count
        else:
            score_down = 999999999
            moves_down = moves_list
            moves_cnt_down = moves_count

        if score_down < best_score:
            best_score = score_down
            best_moves = moves_down
            best_moves_count = moves_cnt_down
        
        if not [r_y, r_x-1] in moves_list:
            look_left = df_locations.loc[(r_y, r_x-1)][0]
            #print(f"   looking left {look_left}")
            if look_left == '.':
                score_left += 1
                moves_left = moves_list + [[r_y, r_x-1]]
                moves_count += 1
                score_left, moves_left, moves_cnt_left = move_reindeer(r_y, r_x-1, '<', score_left, moves_left, moves_count)
            elif look_left== 'E':
                print (f"Reindeer at ({r_y},{r_x}) score {score} after {moves_count} moves")
                score_left += 1
                moves_left = moves_list
                moves_cnt_left = moves_count
            else:
                score_left = 999999999
                moves_left = moves_list
                moves_cnt_left = moves_count
        else:
            score_left = 999999999
            moves_left = moves_list
            moves_cnt_left = moves_count

        if score_left < best_score:
            best_score = score_left
            best_moves = moves_left
            best_moves_count = moves_cnt_left

        return best_score, best_moves, best_moves_count
    else:
        return score, moves_list, moves_count
